casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joseph O. JONES. No. 308P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Marc R. Shapiro, Durham, Henderson Hill, Jacob H. Sussman, Charlotte, for Jones. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st day of July 2008 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th day of October 2008."
